name: Common Smart Contract Vulnerabilities
description: Understanding the most critical security risks in smart contract development.

cards.title: Reentrancy Attacks
cards.description: Exploiting contract execution order to drain funds from a contract.
cards.bulletpoints: Fallback functions, attack vectors, best practices for mitigation

cards.title: Integer Overflow & Underflow
cards.description: Bypassing numerical limits to manipulate contract state.
cards.bulletpoints: SafeMath libraries, Solidity 0.8.x automatic checks, attack examples

cards.title: Unauthorized Access & Logic Flaws
cards.description: Exploiting contract functions due to improper access control.
cards.bulletpoints: Role-based permissions, function visibility, privilege escalation
